title: vonne9108
author: vonne9108
content: I think the answer is 'yes'.>First of all, there is such a thing as honeygain, which is already known to some extent (which earns money by providing data with the internet turned on).(https://www.honeygain.com/)Going one step further, some of the famous P2E projects are said to have earned quite a lot of money.(Of course, it is a matter to think about whether the profits can be maintained for a long time in the long term.)(https://axieinfinity.com/)In addition, there are M2E projects, and many X-to-Earn projects such as V2E projects are emerging.(Even some projects have low barriers to entry.)STEPN-(https://stepn.com/)EarnTube-(https://earntube.io/)There will be more functions according to the popularization of Defi.I would like to answer yes to this question.

comments.author: vonne9108
comments.body: EarnTube is a lifestyle gaming app that integrates with YouTube.It bring WEB3 to online viewing by compensating viewers for their attention and input with inbuilt Game-Fi and Social-Fi elementsYou can find more details > Litepaper: https://view3-view3.gitbook.io/earntube/I guess it will be good example for X-to-earn, cause people watch a lot of YouTube.

comments.author: thefaucetrunner
comments.body: Quote from: vonne9108 on September 23, 2022, 02:07:11 AMEarnTube is a lifestyle gaming app that integrates with YouTube.It bring WEB3 to online viewing by compensating viewers for their attention and input with inbuilt Game-Fi and Social-Fi elementsYou can find more details > Litepaper: https://view3-view3.gitbook.io/earntube/I guess it will be good example for X-to-earn, cause people watch a lot of YouTube.Earntube appears to be a scam.Here's a selection of Trustpilot reviews:"Passing here to leave registered. I also wasted my time, there was only 5 dollars left to complete 80, when the site started giving problems. It is unfortunate that this company uses bad faith with people.""Do not use this once, because this is foolishness, when I reach the minimum withdrawal amount a little more, I am directed to the ad page, let alone make money, to enter the account I can never enter,""its big scam ,when i just reached 75 dls it made my account expired.when i log in, they redirect me to advertising pages that do not open and do not let me enter in any way."
